text: I don't have anything against my mom, but my family has no emotional connection to each other.
author: Adam Carolla

text: My mom was on welfare and the occasional food stamp, but I have never participated in any of those governmental programs, even the ones that kind of work like education, scholarships and whatever, and I managed to do just fine.
author: Adam Carolla

text: I love being a single mom. But it's definitely different when you're dating.
author: Brooke Burns

text: Yes, I always remember my dad's, mom's and my grandma's perfumes.
author: Marc Jacobs

text: Financial hardships were rough on us, even though Mom had a good job at G.M.
author: Ryan White
